post:
We are the Humans over @ DialANetwork. We love to spread passion into our services. Our main aim is quality at affordable prices, for everyone!

We have been providing a range of hosting services for over 20 months now, with 6 different companies worldwide!
We provide something different, a decent service, something we are known for, our support is one of the fastest around, with ticket replies almost instant through out the day and night!
Not only that, we offer multiple location choice.

Our uptime has been great since we started providing virtual private servers, with one outage in the space of a year.

Apply the promotion code “APRILNEWLocation” to grab 30% recurring discount on any of our new German packages below!

Questions?

How long have you been operating?
We have been around for just about 2 years now and have proven to be a success on the web, not only that, we now operate over 6 companies!

Uptime?
Our servers have great uptime, we groom our network providers with a blunt attitude to downtime, you don't want it, we don't, uptime is key! That is why we rarely have any outages!

Great but... Are they oversold?
No, simple. Our prices are at a rate calculated to not oversell and always leave room to grow, most of our users can verify this, we keep Nodes fast, it is our aim!

So how many locations do you have?
For our VPS services, we offer 3 locations currently, USA, France & Germany.

Support?
We offer 24/7 support, with some of the fastest replies in the industry and a team of over 15 men!

We look forward to working with you!
